Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="DeletePADataSet" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Label" Type="System.String" Value="DeletePA;{3};SPA"/> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Msmq"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="DeletePADataTable"> <Columns> <Column Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="reversecut({0},4)-{4}" PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID="{2}"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
